question: Which Indian organisation has constituted a working group to study feasibility of forming a 'pandemic risk pool'?
option4: Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India
explanation:
The Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority (IRDAI) has constituted a working group to study feasibility of forming a 'pandemic risk pool'.
A pool is proposed to be formed, which addresses the risks that are arising out of the pandemic. The existing insurance laws do not cover business interruption losses and this pool is aimed to address this issue. The panel is expected to submit its report in eight weeks.
